mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into board (board_no,category,title,contents,post_date,nick,hits,member_id) values(#{boardNo},#{category},#{title},#{contents},sysdate,#{nick},0,#{memberId})
mapper.update: update board set hits=hits+1 where board_no=#{board_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board where category=#{category}
select count(*) from board where title like '%${value}%'
